meta.title: Keyboard input
meta.description: If you want to tell the user to click on some button or explain a shortcut, you want to use keyboard input. Just wrap the key content into a kbd tag.
meta.author: NoTime

page.innerHtml: If you want to tell the user to click on some button or explain a shortcut, you want to use keyboard input. Just wrap the key content into a kbd tag.
NOTE: This element is not yet fully supported.
